cells.data:
how Visual input perceived and retained?

Hypothesis 1 (doesn't work with data )
perceiving and analysis alternate in fixed or variable intervals

Hypothesis 2 (doesn't work with data)
Information temproarily sotred in limited memory before loss or transfer to more permanetn store, regardless of order.

Hypothesis 3 
Perception begins with substantial visual event occurs. event retained if sufficient time passes until next event. (retention of one item is independent of the previous item, first item (without a clear beginning) is less well retained)

Eye fixation when fast stimulus. eye changes through movement of fixation when stimulus is slow.
